section.title: Supported Modes
section.para: Apache Hadoop cluster can be installed in one of the three supported modes

listitem.para: Local (Standalone) Mode - Hadoop is configured to run in a non-distributed mode, as a single Java process. This is useful for debugging.
Pseudo-Distributed Mode - pseudo-distributed mode where each Hadoop daemon runs in a separate Java process.
Fully-Distributed Mode - Master, Slave cluster setup where daemons runs on seperate machines.
